Posts.Content: Reneeswan wrote: On Friday, my oncologist told me I had a pericardial effusion. I am due to have ecohocardiogram in 10 days. I was wondering if anyone here has any experience with this. I am really concerned after reading about it. Thanks for any help. Log in to post a reply
